text: @GavinNewsom Um @GavinNewsom what about #OrangeCounty? I guess we have to be at 100% ICU capacity? Shut down bars before the 4th of July in OC or we are going to have a horrible few weeks of tremendous growth. LA and Riverside will just come to the OC? #COVID19 #DoSomething https://t.co/8Bf0DxWRQm
